Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted with high-quality materials and cutting-edge technology, ensuring it stands out from the rest. It comes with a comprehensive set of features designed to meet your specific needs and enhance your experience. Given its unique attributes and the value it offers, we believe it's worth more than $12000. Considering its immense potential to benefit you, I am offering this remarkable product to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the investment in innovation and quality that goes into every aspect of the product. I trust that you will find its benefits invaluable. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
